body:
Hello there!

Last month the __VTK-m__ team released its latest version named `v1.5.1`. This new
release only contains `bugfixes` related to compilers error and warnings.

This PR also: 
- Changes the dependency to depend on CMake >= 3.12
- Sets `VTKm_NO_ASSERT` to `ON` by default

Signed-off-by: Vicente Adolfo Bolea Sanchez <vicente.bolea@kitware.com>
title: vtk-m: update Vtk-m pkg to its latest version v1.5.1
